title: Nostro titolo
alert: Fare clic su OK per chiudere.

group.title: PARK.ONE Official Launch Announcement
group.content: Dear all,PARK.ONE today announces official launch of digital asset exchange. With our dedication to providing a secure and efficient digital assets exchange platform, we will offer you quality assets and leading global digital asset exchange.

group1.title: LTC Wallet Maintenance Announcement
group1.content: Dear all,We would like to let you know that records in LTC wallet are overloaded since registeration...

group2.title: Maintenance Completion of LTC Wallet Announcement
group2.content: Dear all,The maintenance of LTC Wallet has completed. LTC withdrawal function is open now...

group3.title: SanChain (SANC) Launch Announcement
group3.content: Dear all,PARK.ONE launches SanChain (SANC). SANC/BTC, SANC/ETH trading pairs will be available...

group4.title: OmiseGO (OMG) Launch Announcement
group4.content: Dear all,PARK.ONE launches OmiseGO (OMG). OMG/BTC, OMG/ETH trading pairs will be available...
